entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle or ice pellets early this evening. Snow mixed with freezing drizzle and ice pellets beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing rain. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
